ygData.messageBody:
Yes, I find it a ton easier to use overhead than 1st person (3rd person might be ok too, but I never got the
hang of it). 1st person it's too easy for things to get in the way, overhead view there's no layering (a MOB
hidden behind a PC or a MOB). Makes it easier to follow moving MOBs, too (since you can actually see which way
they went), so I use it in most fights.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 56 songs, Innoruuk
